title: Marketing website for MJ CySec (cybersecurity startup)

requirements.text: Create a responsive marketing website for the cybersecurity startup named “MJ CySec” with a clear structure, polished copy in English, and strong calls-to-action.

quotes: Create a website for my cybersecurity start up name MJ CySec

acceptanceCriteria: Site renders correctly on mobile, tablet, and desktop screen sizes.
All user-facing text is in English and consistently branded as “MJ CySec”.
Homepage includes a clear value proposition and at least one prominent call-to-action (e.g., “Request a Consultation”).

requirements.text: Implement standard marketing pages/sections suitable for a cybersecurity startup: Home (hero + trust/value props), Services, About, and Contact.

quotes: Create a website for my cybersecurity start up name MJ CySec

acceptanceCriteria: Navigation provides access to Home, Services, About, and Contact.
Services section/page presents at least 3 service offerings with short descriptions.
About section/page includes company overview and mission statement copy (in English).
Contact section/page includes a contact form with name, email, company (optional), and message fields.

requirements.text: Add a Contact form submission flow that persists submissions in the Motoko canister and provides a success/error state in the UI.

quotes: Create a website for my cybersecurity start up name MJ CySec

acceptanceCriteria: Submitting the contact form stores a timestamped submission (name, email, optional company, message) in the backend canister.
UI shows a clear success message after a successful submission and an error message if it fails.
Basic validation prevents empty required fields and invalid email format before submission.
A backend query method exists to list submissions (for future admin use), even if not exposed in the UI.

requirements.text: Apply a coherent, cybersecurity-appropriate visual theme and design system across the site (typography, spacing, components, and color palette) with a distinct style (avoid blue/purple by default).
acceptanceCriteria: Theme is applied consistently across all pages/sections (buttons, cards, headings, links).
Color palette avoids default blue/purple styling unless required for accessibility states; overall aesthetic fits cybersecurity (e.g., charcoal/black with neon green accents).
All interactive elements have clear hover/focus states and meet basic accessibility expectations (e.g., visible focus ring).

requirements.text: Add basic SEO and social sharing metadata for MJ CySec (title, description, OpenGraph/Twitter card) and ensure the site has a clean, professional browser tab title.
acceptanceCriteria: Pages include a meaningful document title (at minimum the homepage).
Meta description and OpenGraph/Twitter metadata are present for the homepage.
Brand name “MJ CySec” appears in the title/metadata.

requirements.text: Render the generated brand images as static assets in the frontend (store them under frontend/public/assets/generated) and use them in the layout (logo in header/footer, hero visual on the homepage, icons in services).
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are placed under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the frontend (not served via backend).
Logo appears in the site header and footer.
Hero background/illustration is used on the homepage.
Service icons are displayed alongside service offerings.

constraints: Use English for all user-facing text.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services).
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other immutable paths provided by the platform; compose them instead.
nonGoals: No user accounts or third-party authentication integrations (beyond what the template provides).
No payments, subscriptions, or e-commerce features.
No real-time chat or WebSocket-based features.

required: Cybersecurity startup wordmark logo reading “MJ CySec”, modern geometric style, dark-mode friendly (mj-cysec-logo.dim_1024x256.png)
Abstract cybersecurity hero background with subtle network/mesh lines and glow accents on a dark charcoal base (mj-cysec-hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
Set of 3 minimal line icons in a consistent style (shield, vulnerability scan, compliance checklist) on transparent background (mj-cysec-service-icons.dim_512x512.png)
